    • decrypt

      Parameters:
      cipherText - The cipher you want to decrypt.
      Returns:
      Returns the plain text.
      Throws:

    • encryptFile

      public byte[] encryptFile(File inputFile) throws Exception
      Encrypts the entire file.You can't open the file after encryption has been completed.
      Parameters:
      inputFile - The file you want to encrypt.
      Returns:
      Returns the file content into byte arrays.
      Throws:
      Exception - Throws exception if operation goes wrong.

    • decryptFile

      public byte[] decryptFile(File inputFile) throws Exception
      Decrypts the entire file.After this you can normally open the file like before.
      Parameters:
      inputFile - The file you want to decrypt.
      Returns:
      Returns the file content into byte arrays.
      Throws:
      Exception - Throws exception if operation goes wrong.

    • generateKey

      public static SecretKey generateKey(int n) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Generates new secret key.
      Parameters:
      n - The length of AES key (128,192,256)
      Returns:
      Returns the generated key.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If no algorithms exist to start encryption.
      InvalidKeySpecException - This is the exception for invalid key specifications

    • createBackup

      public boolean createBackup(String folderPath) throws IOException
      Generates backup from secret key and initialization vector to a file.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - The folder you want to save these files.
      Returns:
      Returns true if operation was successful and false if not.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws IOException of read or writing of files goes wrong.
